label: Fernandez, Nestor, Pieter Theron, Christine Rollard & Elio R. Castillo.  2014. Revision of the family Carabodidae (Acari, Oribatida) VII. Redefinition of the genus Malgasodes; redescription of  M. curvisetus Mahunka, 2000; and complementary description of M. hungarorum Mahunka, 2010. Phylogenetic relationships between Malgasodes, Bovicarabodes, Afticarabodes, Congocepheus and Cavaecarabodes are discussed. ZooKeys 435: 25-48.
